item.title: DWeb Camp: Gathering by the campfire
item.description: ![[thoughts/images/dweb-collage.png]] Fire is a chief metaphor for the Internet: it is metaorganic; it extends the range of (informational) food; it empowers people to explore new time zones (the night) and territories of knowledge; it increases some kinds of sociability, demands ongoing maintenance, and produces dangers and externalities that did not exist before.
